definition: to pile up/to heap up/a mass/pile/heap/stack/large amount
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Composting is a general treatment method for organic solid waste.
sentences.chinese: 堆肥化是处理有机固体废物的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: It was concluded that it is imperative to set up standard on evaluation of sludge compost maturity.
sentences.chinese: 指出在我国建立一套堆肥腐熟度评价标准势在必行。

sentences.english: Professor Curran says another way to make use of weeds is to compost them.
sentences.chinese: 柯伦教授说，另杂草的是将其制成堆肥。

sentences.english: There are many different styles of compost tumblers .
sentences.chinese: 有许多不同风格的玻璃杯堆肥。

sentences.english: Made from cellulose, this shrink-wrap decomposes in a few weeks in a compost rubbish or in an industrial composter .
sentences.chinese: 由纤维素，这拆封分解在数周或垃圾堆肥在工业堆肥。

sentences.english: Do add lime, small amounts of wood ashes or crushed eggshells to the compost pile.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在堆肥中加入石灰，少量的木灰和碎蛋壳。

sentences.english: After Eights' individual sleeve wrappers are also now compostable.
sentences.chinese: 经过八个人套筒包装现在也堆肥。

sentences.english: Our focus in composting is to create humus.
sentences.chinese: 我们的重点是在制造堆肥腐殖质。

sentences.english: These compost tumblers have been built to save you time and work.
sentences.chinese: 这些堆肥念着已建成挽救你的时间和工作。

sentences.english: Professor Curran says composting weeds is another way to make use of them.
sentences.chinese: 克伦教授说将杂草堆肥是利用杂草的另一种方法。

sentences.english: Whilst being fossil fuel-based, AACs are biodegradable and compostable.
sentences.chinese: 虽然是化石燃料为基础，可生物降解和堆肥气冷。

sentences.english: This web site also provides information about composting knowledge, and composter's forum, etc.
sentences.chinese: 这里还提供了堆制肥料的相关知识和堆肥论坛。

sentences.english: It is not biodegradable or compostable but it is recyclable.
sentences.chinese: 虽然不能生物降解或者堆肥，但是可以回收再利用。

sentences.english: The results showed that temperature was the most immediate parameter characterizing the maturity degree of high temperature compost;
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，温度是表征高温堆肥腐熟度的最直接参数。

sentences.english: After classification, about 60 percent of organic matter will be fermented and composted.
sentences.chinese: 分类后，约60%的有机物将进行发酵和堆肥。

sentences.english: I delighted in my daily trip down the hill to dump the refuse on the pile.
sentences.chinese: 每天我快快乐乐地下山把垃圾倒在堆肥堆上。

definition: to make fertilizer by steeping organic materials in water and leaving them to decompose/fertilizer produced by this method
feces and urine/excreta/human or animal waste
